name: scrollfeatures
description: Performant Custom Scroll Features and Events

scripts.build:js: browserify --fast -e src/scrollfeatures.js -d --standalone ScrollFeatures -t babelify | exorcist dist/scrollfeatures.min.js.map > dist/scrollfeatures.min.js
scripts.dist:js: NODE_ENV=production browserify -e src/scrollfeatures.js --standalone ScrollFeatures -t babelify | derequire > dist/scrollfeatures.min.js
scripts.copy:style: cp src/scrollfeatures.css dist/ && cp src/scrollfeatures.scss dist/
scripts.start: yarn copy:style && run-s build:js && run-p watch:js server
scripts.build:lib: yarn copy:style && NODE_ENV=production babel src -d lib
scripts.watch:js: watchify -d --poll=100 --fast --standalone ScrollFeatures -e src/scrollfeatures.js -t babelify -o 'exorcist dist/scrollfeatures.min.js.map > dist/scrollfeatures.min.js' -v

author: SÃ¶nke Kluth <soenke.kluth@gmail.com> (http://soenkekluth.com/)
